thread.title: Exxon Mobil investors frustrated by slow progress

title: Exxon Mobil investors frustrated by slow progress
text:
Exxon Mobil investors frustrated by slow progress 4:30pm IST - 01:51 
Exxon Mobil shareholders are none too pleased with the stock's lackluster performance compared to its rivals and the oil giant's inability to get more oil out on the market at a time when prices are on the rise.   
Exxon Mobil shareholders are none too pleased with the stock's lackluster performance compared to its rivals and the oil giant's inability to get more oil out on the market at a time when prices are on the rise.  //reut.rs/2oWjVSP
